SELECT u.id,u.photo,d.dept_name,ck.address, CASE ck.`status` WHEN 1 THEN '正常' WHEN 2 THEN '迟到' END AS status, CASE ck.risk WHEN 1 THEN '低风险' WHEN 2 THEN '中风险' WHEN 3 THEN '高风险' END AS risk, DATE_FORMAT(ck.create_time,'%H:%i')AS createTime, ck.date FROM tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_dept d ON u.dept_id=d.id LEFT JOIN tb_checkin ck ON u.id=ck.user_id AND ck.date=CURRENT_DATE WHERE u.id=#{userId}
